TopicTitle: And I had just reached my 50th post...

Articles.Content:
Before the Kraken struck. Oh well, good to be back!

On a side note, has anybody noticed the odd pricing of parts? I was trying to challenge myself in a campaign style play, when I noticed that it is far cheaper to buy 4 of the small (one with ridges on the side) fuel tanks than one big orange one. I think, if anything, that should be reversed....
Welcome newcomer! I hope you enjoy this as much as I do! Have fun on the forums!

Welcome back dragoncannon

Part prices are just placeholders, no real thought went into them when they were first set but as career mode is coming ("soon"tm) you can expect to see the prices revised at some point

So have fun budgeting your rockets, and fly safe!
